title: Drums in the Deep (1C168)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Moria
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Skirmish: Make a [Moria] Orc strength +2 (or +4 if skirmishing a Dwarf).
Lore:	“The drum-beats broke out wildly: doomboom, doom-boom, and then stopped … Doom, doom went the drum-beats again….”
Rarity:	C
